name: Mountain Giant
description: The Mountain Giant is a massive creature representing the raw power of the mountains, with formidable physical strength and the ability to manipulate terrain at will.
memorable: Its ability to control earth and unleash devastating boulder attacks makes it a terrifying opponent on the battlefield.
goals: To dominate battles and instill fear through physical prowess and manipulation of its environment.
relations: Often related to other giants, earth elementals, or beings that embody the forces of nature.
environment: Typically found in mountainous regions or rocky terrains.
strengths: Possesses Legendary Resistance, Magic Resistance, and can manipulate terrain like the move earth spell
weaknesses: Average Dexterity makes it somewhat vulnerable to ranged attacks
attacks: Executes two powerful melee slam attacks and can hurl boulders or unleash destructive area attacks with its Boulder Spray.
most_powerful_ability: Can manipulate terrain infinitely, like the move earth spell, creating advantageous battlefield conditions.
senses: Has tremorsense, allowing it to perceive activity in a 120-foot radius, and a high passive perception of 22.
skills: Excels in Athletics and Perception, showcasing exceptional physical capability and awareness.
additional_information: Immunities to cold, fire, lightning, thunder damage
Immunities to being charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, and stunned
Can summon up to five earth elementals to aid in combat
Can deal triple damage to objects and structures as a Siege Monster
Uses a terrifying roar to knock foes prone and damage nearby creatures

mountain giant that summons earth elementals
fearsome creature of the mountains with roar
